Alexander McMaster

I am a writer and ecologist working creatively with the seas. A regular contributor to The Irish Times, I have also published investigative work on fishing conflicts, pollution and piracy.

My work engages coastal communities with the sea through ecology and the arts. I work around the island of Ireland and co-direct an environmental NGO in the Ionian Sea. A professional diving instructor, underwater photographer and seafarer, I am also part of Northern Irish charity Refugee Rescue, operating in the Central Mediterranean.

My roots are on the Atlantic coast of Ireland.

MA Ecology, Culture and Society, Goldsmiths University of London.
BSc Biology and Geography, University of St Andrews.
